name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-company-templates
title: Company Templates
shortDescription: An extension to provide simple approach for company wide used templates in SharePoint Online.
longDescription: This is an extension of the built-in 'New document' experience in a document library in SharePoint Online. It allows you to define a repository (such as a standard document library or an org assets library) which acts as a source of templates that can be used in every document library.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
